name: Sterling-plated TheFlipSideCharm Necklace - Peridot
description:
Someone annoy the shit out of you? Someone waste years of your life? Express your annoyance with a TheFlipSideCharms necklace. 

Some saying options:
You .....are an idiot
Please....shut up
You.....suck
I.....love booze
I...can't stand you
Kiss.....my ass
vodka....gin
please....go away
-If you would like to suggest a saying, choose the option "Special Request Saying" and type in your words at checkout.

Letters are hand stamped, onto sterling plated 14.3mm round charm and will change position with each charm. They will not be exactly like photos. Each comes on an 18" sterling plated chain with 2 peridot accent beads. All charms are made to order and all sales are final.
